com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.model

Interface IBMECMSearchTemplate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IBMECMBaseObject>, IBMECMBaseObject, Serializable

    public interface IBMECMSearchTemplate
extends IBMECMBaseObject, Serializable
    Represents a search template object in IBM Content Navigator. A search template is a save search that is typically created by an administrator and then provided for end users to run.

    It can be also be set with "autoRun" which means it will run automatically when clicked upon.

      • getSearchObjectStores

        IBMECMSearchRepository[] getSearchObjectStores()
        Returns the object stores to be searched. Each object store must have the name and repositoryId keys.

        Search can be performed on only one object store at a time.

        the object stores to be searched

      • retrieveDependentAttributeInfo

        void retrieveDependentAttributeInfo(IBMECMItemProperties attributes,
                                    IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMSearchCriteria[]> onComplete)
        Retrieve information about dependent attributes for search. The information is related to the external data service (EDS).
        Parameters:
        attributes - the key value dictionary for a group of attributes
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns all the dependent information if the call is successful

      • executeQuery

        IBMECMRequest executeQuery(IBMECMSearchPredicate[] searchPredicates,
                           IBMECMTextSearchPredicate textSearchPredicate,
                           String orderBy,
                           boolean sortDescending,
                           int pageSize,
                           IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMSearchResultSet<IBMECMContentItem>> onComplete)
        Execute a query based on the current search template with specified search predicates.
        Parameters:
        searchPredicates - the search predicates for the search criteria in this current search template
        textSearchPredicate - the text search predicates for the text search criteria in this current search template
        orderBy - the order by property name.
        sortDescending - Integer value of (0=false, 1=true)
        pageSize - the size per page
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the search results if the call is successful
        Returns:
        Request object

      • addToFavorite

        void addToFavorite(String favoriteName,
                   IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMFavorite> onComplete)
        Adds the search template as a new favorite. Favorites are a list of items maintained in each IBM Content Navigator's desktop for quicker access.
        Parameters:
        favoriteName - the favorite name to be saved. If null, the favorite is initialized with the name of the search template.
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the new favorite if the call is successful

      • toJsonDictionary

        Map<String,Object> toJsonDictionary()
        Converts the template object into a dictionary.
        Returns:
        the new JSON dictionary
